import './collection-item.styles.scss' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { addItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CollectionItem = ({id, name, price, imageUrl}) => (
{name} {price}
ADD TO CART
) const mapDispatchToProps = (dis) export default CollectionItem
